title: Unhandled exception in User Authentication module
body:
We are encountering an unhandled exception in the User Authentication module. The error occurs when a user tries to log in with invalid credentials. The stack trace points to `AuthController.java:45`. This issue seems to be affecting multiple users and needs immediate attention. Here's a snippet of the stack trace:

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.example.auth.AuthController.login(AuthController.java:45)
```
comments: This seems to be a null pointer issue.
We should add null checks to avoid this.

title: NullPointerException in login function
body:
A NullPointerException is thrown when users attempt to log in with incorrect credentials. The error is traced back to `AuthController.java` at line 45. This is causing the application to crash, and users are unable to proceed. The relevant stack trace is as follows:

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.example.auth.AuthController.login(AuthController.java:45)
```
comments: This needs to be fixed ASAP.
Can we add a try-catch block here?
I will look into this.

title: Login error causing application crash
body:
The application crashes when users enter invalid login credentials. The issue is a NullPointerException in the `AuthController` class, specifically at line 45. This is a critical issue as it prevents users from accessing the application. Below is the stack trace:

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.example.auth.AuthController.login(AuthController.java:45)
```
comments: This is a high-priority issue.
We need to handle null values properly.

title: Crash on invalid login attempt
body:
Our backend service crashes when a user tries to log in with invalid credentials. The stack trace indicates a NullPointerException at `AuthController.java:45`. This is causing significant disruption for users. Here's the stack trace for reference:

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.example.auth.AuthController.login(AuthController.java:45)
```
comments: Can someone verify this issue?
We should add a unit test for this scenario.

title: Unhandled NullPointerException in AuthController
body:
An unhandled NullPointerException is thrown in the `AuthController` class when users attempt to log in with invalid credentials. The error occurs at line 45 and causes the application to crash. This issue needs to be resolved urgently to prevent further user disruption. Stack trace:

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.example.auth.AuthController.login(AuthController.java:45)
```
comments: This looks like a simple fix.
Can we add a null check here?
